amendment.description: Amendment sought to establish a two percent set-aside within State funds to provide oversight of the use of funds by charter schools.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 113-444 to establish a two percent set-aside within state funds to provide oversight of the use of funds by charter schools.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Moore.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
